item.title: What Is TikTok? China’s Popular Video-Sharing App Is Gaining Global Appeal
item.description: ‘What Is TikTok? China’s Popular Video-Sharing App Is Gaining Global Appeal’ [ read more ] Late-night comedian Jimmy Fallon has a new favorite app. Late last year, he challenged The Tonight Show viewers to submit videos of themselves rolling around on the ground like human tumbleweeds on the app TikTok. It got such a good response that he followed … [+3484 chars]
